website_summaries.verdict: A CD mount that's a great choice if your state doesn't allow phone mounts on the dashboard.
pros: Magnetic attachment can be rotated 360 degrees for good viewing angles
cons: Does not work with all CD slot designs

website_summaries.verdict: This is an easy-to-use, affordable and well-functioning magnetic phone holder that slides into the CD player. Universal compatibility – good for either Android or iPhone.
pros: Easy, one-hand installation CD slot-mounted phone holders mean your phone isn’t continually subjected to heat from the vents, which can affect battery life
Non-scratching silicone-covered magnet holds your phone snugly
cons: You can’t use it if your car doesn’t have a CD player slot
May not fit all car CD slots
Requires a smartphone case on certain iPhone models

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, 1 Major Issue
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoyed this product for it's entire usage. Flexible because it fits either side of my cd player and had posable neck. Only issue I have is that after a few months the neck snapped rendering it completely useless.
customer_reviews.author: Amir

customer_reviews.title: but when I tried to swivel the mounting plate plate around for a better view, the arm twisted right off
customer_reviews.text: Pro CD-M broke less than 5 minutes out of the box. Fit snugly in the CD slot, but when I tried to swivel the mounting plate plate around for a better view, the arm twisted right off.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Butler

customer_reviews.title: Be prepared
customer_reviews.text: I'm sorry to say that in my Infinity, this did not work as expected. It consistently falls out of the cd slot, tried it both ways upside down and backwards and it inevitably launches my phone. Mind you this is a sports car and the ride is not super smooth, but has been the only option for parking the phone where it's functional.
customer_reviews.author: Baldybayer

customer_reviews.title: Magnet > Adhesive =  Dysfunctional Product
customer_reviews.text: The magnet is significantly stronger than the adhesive that is used to attach the metal plate to the phone. It is extremely cumbersome to remove the phone from the magnetic holder without having the magnet rip the metal off your phone. The adhesive used is incredibly weak for something that is supposed to hold up to a magnet of this strength or even any magnet. The part that goes into the CD slot is great, but it's worthless if you cannot attach the metal plate to the phone without it getting RIPPED OFF!
customer_reviews.author: Z. Gompers

customer_reviews.title: Fits 2014 Mercedes E350
customer_reviews.text: I got this because I have a TechMatte for my Jeep Wrangler but it interferes with the volume button on the Mercedes. The Koomus works the same except for it has a quick release button. This one doesn't interfere with any of the controls and looks nice. I took it around the block and it doesn't bounce. So far I'm giving it a 5 star on first use. I will update and change accordingly as time goes by.
customer_reviews.author: Murphy the Dog

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, simple to use, and actually works as advertised. Love this holder!
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about it. Easy to install and use. Doesn't harm CD player. Works great as advertised. I don't have a GPS screen or any other screen in my 2011 Honda Fit. This holder allows me to effortlessly and safely use the Android Auto ap on my Galaxy S8+ phone, and (optionally) play it through the car speakers by connecting my phone to the AUX jack in my car. I love being able to have the phone connected to the holder with the magnet, rather than having any additional things to twist or turn. I have the magnet attached to the inside of the hard plastic portion of an OtterBox Commuter phone case.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Murray

customer_reviews.title: No magnets?
customer_reviews.text: Update: purchased this twice. The first time no issues. The second time no magnets were in the box so i bought a package of addon magnets. The glue on these magnets was entirely inadequate - came right off the phone the first time I used it. I now have tried supergluing the magnet to my phone case - we shall see if it works. Disappointed that there were no magnets for the back of my phone in the package. Do I have to buy them separately?
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Erlanger

customer_reviews.title: This thing is great for GPS and Spotify skipping/pausing/whatever for me
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great for GPS and Spotify skipping/pausing/whatever for me. The magnet is more than strong enough for my heavy rugged-style phone and the huge case on it. Can't say much about the adhesive since I just superglued it to the case, but I can say that the magnet is so strong that I have to lift one side off first to remove it from the mount. This results in the mount sliding out of the CD slot a little here and there, but it's no big deal. Also, the grey silicon cover on the cd slot side of the mount loves to grab hair and dust but again, doesn't impact functionality at all. Overall definitely a great mount.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: very strong magnet
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased two of these now, one for each car. If you are looking for a CD slot mount get this one! I have had a few brands and they just aren't strong enough to hold the newer bigger phone or through a thick case. This one does. I have the plate mounted low on my phone so I can still use the wireless charging. With my old mount it would rotate the phone upside down then eventually fall off. It is worth the extra 5 or 6 bucks to get this one because it works.
customer_reviews.author: C.C.

customer_reviews.title: Finally Found A Use For My Car CD Player
customer_reviews.text: I stumbled on this smartphone car mount after looking for a replacement for the one i gave to my daughter. The one i gave her was vent mounted and though it worked, i found it to be questionably stable. This smartphone mount is stable and the magnet is strong enough to hold an iPhone X with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Darrin K. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Fragile
customer_reviews.text: While it lasted about a year for me, I was lucky. The plastic fingers that go inside the CD slot are fragile. Mine broke from simply trying to install it in the CD slot and I slightly missed the slot, caught the finger, and it broke. I inspected the break and learned the other side was also fragile also. I guess I was lucky it lasted as long as it did, because when looking at it I was blown away it didn't break sooner, as fragile of a design it is. Not recommended IMO, look at something else.
customer_reviews.author: John Locke

customer_reviews.title: Update....3rd one just broke too.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this....I like it so much that when the head snapped off the first one after 18 months I bought another one. And then the same thing happened to the 2nd one after 5 months. I'm not heavy handed, I don't swivel it all the time....I would call it regular use. So for it to happen twice is not just bad luck, it's a poor quality product. It's a pity as it does what it should, it's simple and easy. I won't be buying a 3rd one..... Update...ok the seller sent me a 3rd one free of charge, which somewhat mitigates the cost, but WHEN this one breaks I will be looking for another brand.
customer_reviews.author: R. Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Best one so far
customer_reviews.text: I had used the other type of magnetic holders that stick to the dashboard in the past. Just bought a new SUV and did not want to stick anything to the dashboard so I gave this one a shot, glad I did. Holds my phone perfectly, it is an iPhone 7 plus in a heavy Otterbox case and I have no issues of the phone falling or shifting around. Best part is that it can be removed easily and quickly if needed in another car.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Caffray

customer_reviews.title: Faulty Hinge.
customer_reviews.text: I've only use this product for one month and the hinge broke so now I'm without a holder and I'm down $20. I have another one of these which lasted for a much longer time but I'm afraid that one may be soon broken as well. Check other reviews , similar issues happened with other customers. I hope the seller or manufaxturer would either send a upgraded item or refund.
customer_reviews.author: thiswei

customer_reviews.title: A must-have
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd mount I've purchased. It has GREAT magnetic power and it's very reliable. I recommend flipping it upside down - or up -depending on whether or not the holder interferes with any of the push-buttons that might be near it.
customer_reviews.author: Amma-zing

customer_reviews.title: actually better then the one I bought originally
customer_reviews.text: I had to replace an older one I bought about two years ago. I think sitting in the Florida Sun really beat it up my old one and the magnet wasn't as strong as it once was. I decided to go with this one and it works perfectly...actually better then the one I bought originally. I have the iphone 8 plus, I have a thick phone case. I put BOTH magnets this came with on the inside of my phone case and I can easily throw my phone on this magnetic holder and off. I drive on rough roads in my neighborhood and the phone doesnt fall off the holder.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very well built and worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I have not had any issues with my phone falling or this falling out of the CD slot in my 2014 Camry. I've had it for several months and it sits in the summer heat without any issue. The phone does partially obfuscate the LCD on the car radio or the two middle vents, but I can get it centered where it does so minimally, and it isn't the fault of this so much as how the car is designed. I would buy it again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: whatever

customer_reviews.title: Love it. I have an Acura RDX and was ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this from reading the reviews. Love it. I have an Acura RDX and was concerned that I wouldn't be able to see the back-up screen when this was installed. I was able to adjust it to the right of the CD opening and angled it towards the driver. I was able to see the screen and still have access to my phone. The magnet is strong enough to hold my iPhone 6+ without it twisting, jarring or falling. Simple to install and very useful so it can be easily transferred between cars. Strongly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lonnie

customer_reviews.title: good idea but just doesn't do it for me
customer_reviews.text: As I drove down the freeway, every bump caused the phone to move a little until it fell off the magnetic holder. And, when I took it out to throw it away, it destroyed the dust shield on my car's CD slot. I wish I'd known before I purchased one for myself and one for my wife. No thanks...good idea but just doesn't do it for me.
customer_reviews.author: Steven A. Westall

customer_reviews.title: It fits fairly securely in the CD slot (which we really don't use any more) and holds an iphone 6 plus without slipping too bad.
customer_reviews.text: We use this in our car to mount our phones for hands free operation. It fits fairly securely in the CD slot (which we really don't use any more) and holds an iphone 6 plus without slipping too bad. It does have a bit of bounce to it (which is why I dinged it a star) and so if you go over a rough road, the phone tends to rotate and move about. Also the size of the mount tends to bump up against the buttons that are right above the CD slot, which is a bit annoying. But these things aren't showstoppers.
customer_reviews.author: C. A. Rake

customer_reviews.title: Fits in the CD slot, which is the perfect location for my phone!
customer_reviews.text: This easy to install, sturdy and strong cell phone holder is awesome! Works with my case and pop socket holder. Easy to manipulate and take on and off, which I do frequently. It’s a snug fit in the cd holder and does not damage it.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Better than ANY cellphone holder I have ever used!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! I love this product. This allows me to place and remove my phone with one hand in either portrait or landscape. The metal plates were easy to place on the phone and work through my silicone cellphone case. Once in place, my phone is solid and will not move even when I have hit potholes or taken sudden brakes and turns. This installs easily into the CD slot and is easy to remove. If you use your CD player, I would opt for a similar version of this product that adheres to the car using a 3M adhesive.
customer_reviews.author: Opine

customer_reviews.title: Like a microwave!
customer_reviews.text: Hubby had this and would just rave about it! It initially didn’t peak my interest. I received this as a gift and “Wow!”. It’s just what I needed. Doesn’t slip everywhere or fall off. Easy to adjust. I don’t use the adhesive strip and slid the metal part under my phone case, so incase I get a new phone or case I can still use it. Yes it does come with a spare but my children also use my car.....Remember when microwaves were new??? And now, how did we live without them? This is how I feel about this particular magnetic phone holder! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Vellie

customer_reviews.title: Great product until it broke about 6 weeks later.
customer_reviews.text: The product works great but the durability is terrible. I have seen other reviews concerning this product and it breaking after a few weeks but decided to see if it would happen to me as well. It happen this morning. The magnet works great. No issues with the phone falling down or anything like that. I went to pull the phone off the holder today and it broke. i guess i will be returning the product. Not worth the effort of ordering a new one. Need to build a more durable product.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: I like that it uses the CD slot to hold it
customer_reviews.text: Solid connection even through a slim or slick cell phone case. I just taped the included metal plates to the inside of the phone cases and there is still enough strength to keep the phone securely in place. Only complaint is after some use, the imprint of the magnets locations are starting to show on the base, and sometimes leaves a mark on my phone case. I like that it uses the CD slot to hold it, which does bounce some but no fear that of the phone will fall.
customer_reviews.author: SStone

customer_reviews.title: Durability is an issue
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this product, until it broke after 15 months. Now one of the prongs has broken off into my CD player and is triggering the load/eject every time I hit a bump. Now my concern is burning out the CD player or spending an ungodly amount at the mechanic to take apart the dash to get into the player. I bought this holder on the recommendation from a friend who has had no trouble with her CD Slot Koomus holder in the 3+ years she's had it. Maybe there was a change in materials or design?
customer_reviews.author: M. Muckenthaler

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate
customer_reviews.text: I hesitated with this purchase and I really regret it. If you do any considerable amount of driving Don't wait. I have two phones, work, and a personal and spend a lot of time in a vehicle. This keeps my vehicle tidy and perfect for when I'm using the GPS on my phone. I haven't used a cd player in years so it doesn't affect me for it to be in the cd slot. The metal plates are very thin and attached to the inside of my phone cover with no problems. The magnet is super strong and would possibly hold a small tablet or iPad. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t be happier with the superior quality
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried several different ways (and items) for mounting my phone in the car. This is by far the cleanest, easiest and simplest way. The design of this particular model is the best. I bought two different types of CD mounts for my two cars and this one is far superior. Worth the extra money. After tens of thousands of miles in my rough riding Jeep it remains silent and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Denton Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Causes issues with phone's touchscreen
customer_reviews.text: Great idea and works just like it says. However, the powerful magnet messes with my phone's touchscreen. When it is on the holder, the touchscreen either is very lagged or does not work at all around the area of the magnet. Really wanted this to work as it is very convenient since you do not need two hands to mount or unmount. But, if I have to take if off the mount every time I needed to press the answer button or change a song, it defeats the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: LolieMess

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and sturdy cell phone holder!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product! I purchased this mount holder over a year ago, and it is still going strong! I absolutely love it! I love to use different cell phone cases, so I purchased additional magnets for all of the phone cases that I use. The magnet is strong, and I use my mount holder everyday while driving while I use the Waze app. My phone has yet to fall from the mount, which is great. Would highly recommend this cell phone mount!
customer_reviews.author: GE

customer_reviews.title: Bad place. But this mount can be placed over ...
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly with 2014 Mercedes E350. There's a on/off button right below the CD slot. Bad place. But this mount can be placed over it. Like someone said earlier, you can place it to the side... something the other mounts can't do. I have an iPhone 6. I'm getting one for my wife's iPhone 6S Plus in her 2016 Mercedes E350 too! Great purchase and great design. This company's product is top notch! Cannot recommend enough!
customer_reviews.author: MGima

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Small and compact and a very powerful magnet. I have Droid Turbo 2 with a lifebox case which has an acrylic backing and the magnet is able to go through the case. (A problem though the magnet is so powerful it pulls the magnet stuck to your phone off of the phone so you need a case just to keep it secure) The CD connection is great stays in place and is able to angle the phone to face you. Just blocks your CD player. Overall Excellent product and like I said earlier exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Aaron W.

customer_reviews.title: Not Universal
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace an old CD slot phone mount that I unfortunately broke. The construction seems good. The magnet is definitely strong. The BIG downside is that it does not fit in the CD slot on my Jeep Wrangler JK. I mean it does, if I force it in to the point the area around the slot starts to deflect badly. I really wanted to love this, but alas it it a love that cannot be.
customer_reviews.author: matts

customer_reviews.title: I thought this would be really useful due to the magnet and ease of use
customer_reviews.text: When I bought this item, I thought this would be really useful due to the magnet and ease of use. When I received the item, I installed the koomus device and placed the magnet on my phone. Every time I would remove my phone, it would remove the whole koomus device from my CD player, leaving scratches and destroying the cd opening. This is not a product I would recommend. Maybe if the koomus device was more stable, and if the magnet was not as strong, it could work..
customer_reviews.author: MasummanOne

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome!!! Fit perfectly in my Mercedes Benz with a clean look
customer_reviews.text: This thing was a perfect fit for my car. It went nicely in my cd player slot, and fit right over my volume knob that is right under the cd player slot and it was easy to instal. Strong magnet and its a great spot for the phone. I like how it also tilts towards you and in any position that works for you! A must buy!
customer_reviews.author: Johnathan

customer_reviews.title: So Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for about a month. So far, it has stayed in place, not broken and done it's job flawlessly! It holds my phone in place with no issues whatsoever. I really love this little holder. Update- August 2020: I've had this mount for about 1.5 years. I have really enjoyed using it, but it gave up the ghost a few days ago. The mount snapped off the from the piece that secures it into the vent, rendering it completely useless. Was hoping it would last me a little longer that this.
customer_reviews.author: Girlpwr65

customer_reviews.title: I loved it until it broke
customer_reviews.text: I would’ve given this guy five stars if they hadn’t snapped in half. I honestly was not rough with it at all. I really like how it fits in my CD holder, I may see if the seller will replace it or purchase it again. It really was very helpful. The magnet is strong enough that it will pull anything hanging from your mirror that is magnetic to it. For example the metal on your work lanyard.
customer_reviews.author: Lunastella22

customer_reviews.title: Great for Mercedes GLK250
customer_reviews.text: This phone holder fits perfectly in the cd sot of my Mercedes GLK250. I had so much trouble finding a phone holder that wouldn't interfere with the controls on the radio/nav system. And because of the round air vents, the clip on type wouldn't work. The Koomus Pro is stable, small profile but the magnet is powerful and holds my phone securely even over rough terrain. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Julia Fitzsimmons

customer_reviews.title: Good product ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this product a lot. However, it did stretch the opening of my CD player after some time, so it is not as tight as it once was. I rarely take it out, so that might be the problem. I have two jeeps and have this device in both of them, so clearly I like the product. You phone attaches with a strong magnet on the holder by a metal pad that attaches to your phone on the back. It even works through a case. Good value ... good product.
customer_reviews.author: Laguna Beach

customer_reviews.title: Way too much money!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is waaaaaaaaayyyyyy over priced but I will give it 5 stars for being the best one out there. The two side tape on the plates are garbage and don't stick long at all. I had to us gorilla glue to stick it to my case and that did the tick. The two sided tape sucks on all of these type of holders so I would give them less starts for the tape - I see th purpose bc it's supposed to be removable but my phone is way too heavy with a case for it to hold and it's a leather case.... Use glue and ur golden.
customer_reviews.author: D.S.

customer_reviews.title: Plate won’t stick
customer_reviews.text: Ok product but metal plate would not stay adhered to my phone case or the iPhone alone. Before someone snarks, yes I removed the plastic cover Over the adhesive from the plate. As soon as I put my phone up to the magnet, the plate was pulled completely off the device (both in the case and without). I am leaving the plate on my phone case over night to see if it improves. Update: time did not improve the plate adhesive performance. Putting this down as an epic fail.
customer_reviews.author: Abrahim

customer_reviews.title: Great for 345 days!
customer_reviews.text: This product was great until I went to reach for my phone, barely tapped the side, and my phone with half the mount attached flew across my dash, bouncing around left and right. It made my feel like a clumsy ninja. It ended up just being a break in the plastic ball joint piece connecting the mount. It lasted 345 days so I'll be contacting support for a replacement. It really was impressive while it lasted. Should have used metal ball joint instead and we would avoid this issue. What if my screen had cracked on my cell phone?? *Update... They sent me the new updated version so it's even better and I'm very happy with customer service. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: John Bauer

customer_reviews.title: Great Design...Form and Function are excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Best option and design for mounting that I have yet to try. Tried several other options that just never worked well or required being on the windshield or stuck to dash. The only reason I don't give 5 stars is that the mount shifts and slightly comes out when pulling phone off and the plastic seems very weak / cheap at the ball mount so I feel you need to be careful if you tile the ball around without removing the entire mount and being careful. I have a 2012 Acura TSX without nav. The design is excellent and works great especially when using your phone for navigation! Just my opinion and I would recommend you buy this.
customer_reviews.author: sef

customer_reviews.title: Plastic piece holding it all together broke after 9 months
customer_reviews.text: The plastic piece that holds the magnet and swivel ball to the part that goes into the CD slot got brittle sitting in the car and broke off 9 months after I bought it. It was great until then. So I question longevity of the product.
customer_reviews.author: YellowJacket2000

customer_reviews.title: This is by far the best car phone holder I've used or seen
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best car phone holder I've used or seen. I did not have to use the included metal plate to mount my Samsung S8. Once I opened the package I simply placed the holder in the CD slot (fits perfect in my 2013 Mini Cooper S Convertible's CD slot) then placed my S8 on the holder. It works perfectly and does not move or wiggle even on bumpy roads. By they way, my S8 never has to leave the slim case to work with this holder. Perfect, Perfect, Perfect! I highly recommend this product. At less than
customer_reviews.author: M. Grant

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for about 3 months
customer_reviews.text: After time the phone starts to flop around. The tension in at the pivot point diminishes over time and now the phone wont stay in a usable position. Every bump in the road flops the phone. Early on i was very happy now... a bit disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Forrest

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with this product. It does exactly what it advertises and it's actually even smaller than it looks. The magnet is strong enough to hold my iPhone 6S Plus securely even through a thick rubber case! If I had to say something negative about it I would say that the rubber coating around the magnet should be black instead of grey so it blends into the dash a little better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Addict

customer_reviews.title: Could Not Be Happier
customer_reviews.text: Let me preface by admitting my CD player does not work, so I have no idea if this product would damage that area. That being said, once inserted, there have been no problems whatsoever with the item. Phone does not fall, comes off without taking the magnet with it, steady and sturdy either horizontal or vertical. I have an iPhone 7+ for size reference, and am using the item in a 2001 Toyota Corolla removable face plate CD player with the face plate removed.
customer_reviews.author: Mary H.

customer_reviews.title: Strong magnet, easy to install, but lacking in material choice.
customer_reviews.text: I'd first like to say that this phone mount was one of the best I've owned up until it snapped at the neck. The magnet is strong, and it was very easy to install into my CD slot. The mount held my phone securely without any major vibrations. However while I was driving one day the mount along with my phone dropped to the floor of my car. Upon inspection of the mount the ball joint going from the magnet mount to the CD mount had snapped. Really wished they picked a more durable plastic or found a different material, because this was honestly one of the better phone mounts I've used.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great if you're looking for a low profile CD slot phone mount!
customer_reviews.text: I love the slim profile look of this CD slot phone holder. I have the other Koomus CD phone holder and this definitely takes up a lot less real estate. However, the mechanism in which is secures itself to the cd slot does not seem as strong as my other Koomus phone holder since I do notice my phone shake alot more when mounted on this holder than my older one. Other than that, it does the job. The magnet is extremely strong and I've never worried about it falling off the mount.
customer_reviews.author: only1tonywin

customer_reviews.title: Very nice! What I was hoping for
customer_reviews.text: I really like this! Great quality product for a good price. My phone gets held securely and when I remove it the Koomus doesn't get pulled from out of the CD slot. Only thing I can see happening is on a hot summer day that your phone will sit in the hot sun underneath your windshield, but that can't be avoided and all similar products have this dilemma. Great option to consider.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Smith

customer_reviews.title: great for glc mercedes
customer_reviews.text: i saw a post on a forum about this cd phone holder being re-purposed to work with a mercedes benz glc. it works great. you have to wedge it between the small gap of the trim and dashboard. i attached photos for reference. ive had it for a few weeks now and it has not left any marks on the dash board when i removed it. i also have the smaller screen stereo system. i dont think it will work with the larger screen option.
customer_reviews.author: Stevie

customer_reviews.title: Best Mount I've Ever Purchased
customer_reviews.text: I have had this magnetic cell phone holder for invert two years, which makes it the longest lasting. The magnet had good power, the neck swivels just fine and had yet to break, and I like that it fits in either side of the CD slot. When I rent cars, I take this holder with me because it's convenient and makes mmt driving/navigation easier. My sole con is that it does shake a lot. Although the roads in Cakifornia aren't the best, it does annoy me that the phone shakes so much. However, my phone head never fallen off the mount.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Best cell phone mount
customer_reviews.text: Excellent solution for hands free phone use. Have tried many others and this one is superior than all others, hands down! The power cord stays out of the way, the phone is easily viewable, and the magnet is so strong, it takes both hands to separate the phone from the magnet. Down side is, if you still use your CD player, you have to remove this device to access the cds’.
customer_reviews.author: Numbers Man

customer_reviews.title: Solid Hands Free Phone Mount
customer_reviews.text: This is the best vehicle device holder I have had! I bought this product soon after using my boyfriend’s, and not disappointed. The magnet is strong—even through a phone case. (I placed one magnet inside of my protective case, so the strength IS less than if the magnet was directly touching the Koomus mount/platform.) I really appreciate the fact that the product comes with two separate magnets; one to share, save, or use for another device. Overall I enjoy the placement of the device in the CD player slot; it is convenient for maps/directions and speakerphone calls. Overall solid product and glad to have it!
customer_reviews.author: Emily K.

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for Ford Fusion
customer_reviews.text: It's a good small product. Problem is with the tension holding this item in your CD player. The tension is very light compared to the magnetic power between your phone and this item. Every time you take your phone off it slowly to fully pulls the contraction out of the CD player. I recently purchased their old version where you tighten the tension with the screw and that is what I needed for my Ford Fusion. I don't have to worry about it falling when I take my phone off. The new item has a small defect but Its something I can work with.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have had this product for over three months now. Definitely the best car mounting solution I have used. The magnet is strong and have never had a concern about the phone falling. It allows rotation 360 degrees. FIts securely into the CD slot of my 2007 4Runner. Removing the phone is easy and have never questioned the hold into the CD slot. I have a wallet case and have the plate mounted on the outside of the phone case and was concerned about it at first but never notice it at this point. Through several months of frequent on and offs, the adhesive is still going strong. Absolutely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Justin D. Ellett

customer_reviews.title: Had mine for 3 years...and it snapped off today.
customer_reviews.text: Had mine for 3 years...and it snapped off today. I wasn't twisting the swivel or anything...just noticed the magnet on the back of my phone when I got out of my truck. Maybe it's not made to stand the heat in Texas. Also, I see this is a quite common review. $20 for a 3 year life span is not good enough. Seems with some better engineering, it could be made to last longer than three years. I'll be looking for something else.
customer_reviews.author: Papadejustin

customer_reviews.title: Thick cases beware.
customer_reviews.text: Well built product, i like that it comes with 2 metal plates so that you can have one for you and or significant other. Or just a spare. If you have a thin case then this works great and just like it is described. But if you have a thick case like mine it will hold but it turns on the mount. Unlike the picture shows where you can take your phone and turn the mount with it, that just won't happen. But it holds my phone and i just keep it upright so i am happy and can't complain to much. Wish it was a solid magnet behind the rubber on it and not multiple small ones.
customer_reviews.author: TekkFit

customer_reviews.title: this isn't a long term use review, but I've ...
customer_reviews.text: this isn't a long term use review, but I've had it about a week now. I have a car where the dash is cloth and I've never had luck with any kind of magnetic holder sticking onto any part of my car, but this finally seems to be the answer. And the CD slot is a way more convenient place to have it while I'm driving than in my line of sight, or way on the other side of the dashboard. Kind of a silly thing too but the metal plates to stick on your phone are a little more "premium" feeling on this than on many other magnetic mounts I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I have to start saying, this has been by far the best magnetic cell phone holder. I love it so much. I easy have my phone play kids shows and movies to my daughter, while she is ion her car seat. What a great product. I Highly recommend this to everyone I know.
customer_reviews.author: Cris0911

customer_reviews.title: The best in the market
customer_reviews.text: Buy it you won’t regret !! If u don’t want to stick this little plate on the back of your phone just drop it inside your phone case (no sticking needed there too) I have an apple leather case it works perfect without even noticing anything in there.. suction is so strong in the leather case that even on the bumpiest road it won’t even move your phone a bit !! Stick your phone horizontally and vertically without setting anything up I’ve been looking for something like this for ages !!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works but be careful if you have a wireless charging phone.
customer_reviews.text: This works great in my 2016 Mercedes C300. I would give it 5 stars except that after I put the metal card on the case of my Samsung Galaxy S6 edge + I can't use a wireless charger :( Somehow the metal card you need for the magnet interferes with the wireless charger so now I have to take the case off when I want to charge.
customer_reviews.author: C. E. Young

customer_reviews.title: Great... until the fatal neck snap
customer_reviews.text: I loved this phone holder, recommended it to everyone, used it several times per week until I got into my car this morning and the neck holding the magnet to the CD slot piece snapped. Then the CD slot piece was stuck in the slot, possibly too large for the CD slot in my Subaru Outback? When I finally removed it, the screen on my dash was a little scratched behind the device and the CD slot was slightly warped inside. Looking at many other reviews, the neck snapping seems to happen to many people. Oh well... back to the drawing board. Hope this company fixes the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Adrien Barbas

customer_reviews.title: Broke After Only 4 Months
customer_reviews.text: Just self-destructed between the CD mount and the ball joint (see pic) after only 4 months of use. The unit as a whole would free itself from the CD slot about once a week anyway. Product is neither durable nor particularly good at its intended purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Rob R

customer_reviews.title: Magnet skeptic turned avid user. STRONG MAGNET
customer_reviews.text: I'm really happy I found this, it's durable and doesn't fall out of the CD slot, doesn't obstruct my view or any air vents. It isn't bulky and clumsy looking. Super easy to pop in and go. I was worried about super taping a magnet to the back of my phone, and I didn't want to tape it to my beautiful phone case. But the magnet is strong enough to stick it to the inside of the phone case. Actually that's the best way I'd prefer, despite any worries about aesthetics. The magnet is so strong, if it wasn't taped backwards like that, it would be a bit hard to pull off (which, some people might really like that).
customer_reviews.author: melody

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: We have two of these. One holds the cell phone perfectly and securely. The other simply does not. Phone regularly falls. Something is wrong with the product. I should have returned it immediately. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: BRSMS

customer_reviews.title: After a long search, finally found the best!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried so many magnetic phone holders and this is BY FAR the best! 1. It's really compact (awesome for traveling/packing) 2. The mechanism to attach it to the CD is superior in every way compared to the screwing method that others use. Click and go! 3. The soft yes strong base is also excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Suleiman ALAQEL

customer_reviews.title: I like that this came with two pieces of metal for ...
customer_reviews.text: I like that this came with two pieces of metal for two phones, the only down side is that when I transfer to my work vehicle, there is no CD player so it doesn’t work in some cars. Works as described as long as you get full contact on the magnet with your phone. Would recommend finding the center of gravity on your phone both landscape and portrait before adhering the steel and picking the best position for both views. I have the iPhone 8plus now, 6splus before (both large screens) and if not centered it can tilt easily due to the size. Normal sized phones seem to work better.
customer_reviews.author: mvb

customer_reviews.title: Larger phones will shake a bit.
customer_reviews.text: The dash on my Toyota Avalon does not have the space to adhere a magnetic holder. My wife has a iPhone 8 Plus. This holder fit in the CD slot, well. Due to the extra weight of the phone it shakes when driving. A smaller phone might not have this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte, NC

customer_reviews.title: ... that gone in your air vent and I really hated that. those blocked the vent and the putting ...
customer_reviews.text: I had one of those holders that gone in your air vent and I really hated that. those blocked the vent and the putting the phone in and out was a hassle. These function really really well and are super convenient. I have mounted mine in to the CD drive which I have never used since I bought the car. Also I have stuck the metal piece inside my phone case which has been working quite well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Dark Knight

customer_reviews.title: Just... AWESOME. Finally a way for me mount the phone without ruining any part of the car with sticky adhesive type products.
customer_reviews.text: I ABSOLUTELY LOVE this product! I wish I could have found a way to get a discount, but it is awesome! I have all my coworkers in my dept placing orders for these now that they've seen it in my car. I didn't have to say a word, the thing sells itself. The magnet it awesome, phone has never fallen out. I like the fact you get 2 backings so you can put one on the phone itself and one in a phone case if you want. Also the fact that it is movable left-right within the CD slot, so you can choose exactly where to put it. The quick release button works perfect. All said, excellent purchase!
customer_reviews.author: IndependentThinker

customer_reviews.title: works great even with metal plate under phone case
customer_reviews.text: using this with metal plate UNDER spigen tough armor case to keep it hidden and the magnet STILL holds it solid! would probably grab it too much if the metal plate was on the outside of the case. haven't tested it with my iphone battery case (will install the metal plate on the outside) but I believe the magnet will be plenty strong to hold the added weight. the ball-in-socket design allows you to rotate and pitch the phone in your desired angle. highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Tom Slick43

customer_reviews.title: Solid and works great
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mount. I have 2 phones. I have the metal plate between the phone and the case on both phones. It is solid as heck with my iPhone as the case on it has a very flat back. My LG G3 is a little different story. It stays pretty good, but with the slight curvature and texture of the Supcase Unicorm Beetle case (which is very good as well), it can move when going down rough roads. I like this so much I just purchased a dash mounted one for my truck.
customer_reviews.author: erictepe

customer_reviews.title: Not best for my car but the product it's self is wonderful
customer_reviews.text: This phone mount is very sturdy and the magnet is strong enough to work through MY phone case which was a problem with previous magnetic mounts I've owned. My only gripe with this one is no fault of the manufacturer, is that I have to mount it upside down because my car has a lip over the CD insert which is also directly on top of my touch screen panel. If you drive a Hyundai, this may not be the best suited phone mount for you. Even despite that, this product works great!
customer_reviews.author: Nico Saldivar

customer_reviews.title: Great product but only lasted a year
customer_reviews.text: **YEAR REVIEW** Great product and it’s lasted me only a year. I definitely expected more. It’s very handy and keeps me from having to fumble with getting my phone in place for when I’m driving. The magnet is super strong and the phone rarely falls off unless you hit some serious pothole or something. Sad that it broke already... ): Poor plastic quality!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Chou

customer_reviews.title: The updated unit is night and day better than the older unto I had
customer_reviews.text: The updated unit is night and day better than the older unto I had. The magnet is much stronger as is the plates that came with it. It seems they are thicker gauge material without the weight. The until also fits in the cd slot much better. The only con I have is it doesn't sit as high as the old one so it blocks a few buttons on my radio. Not a show stopper by any means.
customer_reviews.author: Marco

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised, very stable
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, I tried a different brand previously that only lasted a few months before it broke. This has lasted several months with no signs of weakening and the phone is firmly held in place and does not wobble at all while driving. Magnet is very powerful and I have it on the inside of a hard case, not on the outside. Very impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Maximus33

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t lock in.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t lock into CD slot. During heavy vibration the unit has slid forward. I have to keep an eye on it to avoid potentially dropping my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L

customer_reviews.title: A must buy!
customer_reviews.text: I can't go in any vehicle without this mount for my phone. It's relatively small, easily fits in your CD holder (mine is a Ford 2014 escape), and the magnet on the phone for this mount is extremely strong and well made. It's not strong enough that it's a struggle to put on and pull off the phone. Literally, one of the greatest accessories I've purchased for my vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Solid! Perfect Solution for Hands Free Cell Use in the Car
customer_reviews.text: Nutshell: holds iPhone 7 Plus no problem, work around my round air vents, avoid blocking vents; adjustable L/R and up/down (less flexible but movable), perfect viewing from driver's seat, and as it sits in the CD slot minimal blocking of my other panel instruments. Been testing for almost a month now and it HOLDS STRONG. Not one drop. Does it shake and vibrate a bit? Yes of course, but my 7Plus doesn't shift on the magnet at all and the clasp holds onto the CD opening. Driven over rough pavements, potholes, parking structure bumps, uphill and windy roads. Also tried 3 others and this was the strongest. Highly recommend. I'm a true Waze driver now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer💫

customer_reviews.title: The great thing about this phone holder is that it is ...
customer_reviews.text: The great thing about this phone holder is that it is magnetic. The not so good thing is that I had a hard time inserting this into my CD player. Once inserted it does not stay solidly in place. If I pull on the phone to hard, the entire holder comes out of the player. I guess that it really doesn't fit my CD player. My car is the Lexus IS 200t.
customer_reviews.author: dj

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: We've had this for quite some time now, and it's an okay product. If the insert can fit tighter so that it doesn't fall off occasionally it would be an extremely good item. Just in the last month, each time I drive my husbands car and use this, my phone would fly off. My husband also mentioned this happens more often now than when he first got it. We still use this because we still like the idea of not having to use our vents and really is convenient to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very solid
customer_reviews.text: Very solid item. Magnet is strong, hold up while driving in Brooklyn even with all the dips and potholes. Like magnet over contraption to take out and out back quickly. Only knock, is that i wish it fit more snug in the cd slot. Also not bulky so was able to put all the way on the right side of cd slot to not block any features or buttons on car too badly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Minimal look and excellent functionality
customer_reviews.text: This comes with 2 metal plates and takes 2 seconds to install. It's a great price, easy, small and overall exactly what i wanted in a car phone mount. i would definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: lewis

customer_reviews.title: it was good until...
customer_reviews.text: good until I tried to take it out and I thought I was gonna have to break it off! Darn thing would not budge. Maybe the heat expanded the plastic and spring to such an extent that it was tough to remove. Seriously, I was scared I was gonna have to break it and have the plastic inside my CD player and then my husband would have to take apart the dash. Anyways the magnet was fine.
customer_reviews.author: AMH

customer_reviews.title: By far, this is the best car phone mount made . . .
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone mount over two years ago for my car. It has worked great. I recently put this into my wife's car and bought a BesTrix model CDM 12, which is very similar to the Koomus model. But, the BesTrix is a piece of junk - very weak and doesn't hold up to bumps and turns. I'm buying another of these Koomus models for my car today.
customer_reviews.author: PWY

customer_reviews.title: Best thing ever
customer_reviews.text: Best thing ever. It holds the phone so well that the phone doesnt fall off the magnet when the road is bumpy or on a long drive. The only thing is you need to stick the metal thin sticker to use it with the base magnet on the back of your phone or the phone case. In my case I stuck it on my phone and I regret it, I wish I stuck it on the case because I cannot use my phone on charging plates because the thinmetal sticker blocks it from charging my phone. However, included in the package they proved you with an extra sticker but I lost it. Great gadget and I love this phone holder.
customer_reviews.author: aline pilibossian

customer_reviews.title: The best money that I have spent in a long time
customer_reviews.text: How can something so simple be such a benefit. I have struggled for years with the right place to carry my phone when driving. This is a fantastic product that just makes sense. If your CD player slot is at the correct spot, this is the answer to all of your cell phone issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best phone mount!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried 3 previous phone mounts, and none have worked very well. This is the best! I have an iPhone XR and this holds it in place securely. It’s very easy to take the phone on and off. I put the magnet under my phone case so I didn’t have to use the adhesive and it works perfectly. The mount was easy to install in my cd slot. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Schettino

customer_reviews.title: Best solution yet.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best solution I've found yet to mount my phone in the car. Much better than the vent mounts and suction mounts I've tried. This mounts very solid in the CD slot and really holds your phone tight. Even used it in a track car on a race track and it didn't move! Only negative, I suppose, is you can't use the CD player...but who does anymore?
customer_reviews.author: Michael D Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Foolproof
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd time I have purchased this product. The first time was about 3 years ago. It held up very well. It broke due to my own mishandling. It's easy to use. I have had no luck with the ones you put in the vent or suction on. I docked a point this time due to the magnets. I'm on the 3rd one already. I'm going to have to super glue it on.The last time I purchased this product the magnets were stuck on. I couldn't remove them. All in all though it's worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Casey M Dare

customer_reviews.title: Puts phone where I want it
customer_reviews.text: I really like this holder. I’ve tried a bunch of different styles. This one puts my phone in a great spot where I can clearly see the screen. The magnet is strong and secured the phone well. It is easily adjustable to the angle needed. It’s nice to be able to move the holder from car to car without leaving marks or having to get more tape.
customer_reviews.author: Guru1200

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: This is cheaply made. I’ve had two of these and neither one of them lasted over a month!! Amazon replaced the first one. It break where the magnet connects to the holder. It’s just held together with a plastic nut and after a few bumps in the road, it breaks!!
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Positioning blocks screen in 2016 Corolla
customer_reviews.text: It seems pretty secure in the CD slot, and the magnet is very secure. Despite what some reviewers said, I had no trouble taking the phone off the mount. My one issue was with the positioning in my car (a 2016 Toyota Corolla). If the phone is on the mount, even in landscape, it blocks the screen so I can't see music information, the backup camera view, etc. So just be sure to check how close your CD slot is to things like that before you order.
customer_reviews.author: DogMaTX

customer_reviews.title: This phone holder works great. It fits perfectly into the cassette tape player ...
customer_reviews.text: I have an older car 2005 Chevy Impala (it still has a cassette tape player in it!) and was having a really hard time finding a phone holder that would actually work. I tried other vent clip phone holders, but my iPhone 6s was too heavy for them and it would just fall right out of the vents. This phone holder works great. It fits perfectly into the cassette tape player and has yet to fall out. The magnet is strong. I have not noticed my phone battery dying any faster like I did with a different magnetic phone holder I had used previously.
customer_reviews.author: sculp0401

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Florida
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for if you live in Florida and don't want to buy a phone mount held on by glue! I love this so much, it keeps my phone out of the cup holders and out of the way! The only complaint that I have isn't about the phone mount it's just because I have a bigger phone so when it's on the mount it blocks my air controls.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Great and versatile!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for almost 2 years now and have really come to appreciate its usefulness. It serves as a great holder for my phone while I drive, even with a leather wallet case on my phone. The magnet is stronger than the holder my friend has. I have also used it to mount my phone on a tripod to record video by taping the magnet holder to the stand. It's super nice to jump in and out of the car and just grab the phone off the dash without fiddling with clamps and whatnot. Glad I still have a CD player for this to work with!
customer_reviews.author: KNorton

customer_reviews.title: Love.
customer_reviews.text: Magnets are strong and holds onto my phone (Samung S8+). The only small thing that bugs me is the depth of the grips that are inserted, they hold in place but will move when you go to remove the phone from the magnet mount. Love the metal plates that are provided, they hold securely. My phone case has metal plates in it but im guessing not enough as they don't hang on as securely until I added the provided plates.
customer_reviews.author: Mano Est

customer_reviews.title: Not in the way of air vents. And a strong magnet!
customer_reviews.text: So far it's been great. I wanted to try this so I wouldn't be blowing hot air onto my phone in the winter, which is what happens with the air vent style magnetic holder I had in the past. Coming from a Wizgear vent clip magnetic holder, the magnet is 50% stronger. I will definitely recommend this model of holder to my friends in the future (as long as they don't play CDs, but even then it's fairly easy to take out)
customer_reviews.author: Nick Lukefahr

product_meta.title: Koomus Pro CD-M Universal CD Slot Magnetic Cradle-less Smartphone Car Mount Holder for all iPhone and Android Devices, Single
product_meta.description: Style:SingleKoomus Pro Magnetic series offers three different applications. CD slot, Air vent and Dashboard/Windshield mounts. Koomus Pro Magnetic CD slot mount is very easy to install and use. Simply push a button and slide it into CD slot and you're ready to use. Attach the metal plate at the back of your smartphone case or inside of smartphone case or at the back of smartphone directly. Attach your smartphone into the magnetic head and you're now hands free, not having to worry about your phone while driving. Let us focus on securing your devices, so you can focus on the road ahead with Koomus Pro magnetic series.
feature_bullets: Innovative and easy installation on any CD slot
Cradle-less, hassle free Quick and Easy snap-in one hand mounting system
Full 360 degree rotatable, can be mounted with protective case on it
Universal compatibility with all iPhone and Android devices
This product is covered by U.S Patent and Trademark of Koomus
A smartphone case is required for use with iPhone X model

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars3,361 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
